author: Firestar-Reimu
body:
I do not want the:
```
PowerShell 7.0.3
Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

https://aka.ms/powershell
Type 'help' to get help.
```
on the top of the screen, how to delete it?

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
Start pwsh with the `-NoLogo` switch. 🙂 

(or just use `Clear-Screen` after it starts)

comments.author: Firestar-Reimu
comments.body:
"Start pwsh with the -NoLogo switch."

Can I fix it in a file so I can start it with double-click?

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: Yeah, you can create a standard shortcut to pwsh and add the parameter to the Target box of the shortcut.

title: A Clean Window
